original_title: A. Palolo: Ver o Pensamento a Correr
overview: The film's starting point was an exhibit at the Centre of Modern Art (Gulbenkian) in Lisbon. By evoking a time in the past and the adventures of the artist's generation, Silva Melo is able to depict the oeuvre and the artistic persona of António Palolo.
tagline: The ever-changing portrait of António Palolo.
title: A. Palolo: Ver o Pensamento a Correr
